item.description:
When Victor Sharrah woke up one morning he saw demons everywhere he looked.
Thanks to the excellent Victor and @avmello_ for speaking to me about this rare Kafkaesque condition - prosopometamorphopsia - which distorts how faces appear.
My story for @AFP:https://t.co/iVext8qFCW

â€” Dan Lawler (@DanielLawler) March 22, 2024
